alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson; Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 13 at 6:20PM CDT until June 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Western Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 6 miles southeast of Sunray, or 14 miles northeast of Dumas, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Stinnett and Pringle. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
